Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Tee-hee! So, what do you think?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Selphie}{Line}“Тебе тоже нужно скорей{Line} переодеться! Нас все ждут!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“You should get changed, too.{Line} We have that party to go to.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Selphie}{Line}“Вначале одень новую форму!{Line} А потом зажжём вечеренику!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Gotta get changed for that PAAH-TAY!{Line} SeeD uniform, here we go!”
Selphie{Line}“Well, well!?{Line} What do you think!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}(Get changed? Training center?{Line} What’s this all about?)
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}(Get changed? Training center?{Line} What’s this all about?)

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“We’re SeeDs now, so we have{Line} our own rooms.”{Next}“Your room’s over there.”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“We’re SeeDs now, so we have{Line} our own rooms.”{Next}“Your room’s over there.”

Monologue.Current: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.
Monologue.Original: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.
